body_html: From nvprof on the example from the issue: I'm getting 8.0 ms for one step of cuDNN forward on this branch, 8.4 ms for one step of the non-cuDNN (fused) forward, and 13.5 ms for one step of cuDNN forward on master. On backward, it's cuDNN on this branch 17.0 ms, cuDNN on master 20.8 ms, and non-cuDNN fused 23.7 ms, for a total of 25.0 ms per step on this branch, 34.3 ms per step on master, and 32.1 ms per step with the non-cuDNN kernel.
